ac: 24, touch 14, flat-footed 20 (+5 armor, +1 deflection, +4 Dex, +5 natural, -1 size)
special_attacks: combat style (natural weapon), favored enemy (humans +2), rend (2 claws, 1d6+9)
other_gear: +1 chain shirt, cloak of resistance +1, ring of protection +1, 100 gp
feats: Rending Claws, Skill Focus (Perception), Sprinting Troll*, Weapon Focus (claw), Weapon Focus (bite)
senses: darkvision 60 ft., low-light vision, scent; Perception +15

sections.body: Troll wardens are hunters, messengers, and scouts, tasked with exploring new lands, finding food, and relaying news.

name: Troll Warden
